subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ichiro Suzuki and Travis Hafner each had three hits, and David Phelps pitched well enough to get the win as the Yankees moved to 13-3, counting the postseason, at Target Field.
snippet: Ichiro Suzuki and Travis Hafner each had three hits, and David Phelps pitched well enough to get the win as the Yankees moved to 13-3, counting the postseason, at Target Field.
